article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. og.description: Residents of northeastern Yuma near Arizona Western College are organizing their opposition to a proposed 124-unit apartment complex at the northwest corner of 24th Street and Avenue 9E.
og.title: Proposed apartments draw neighbors’ scorn
